body_html: In general, most TensorFlow Ops act functionally, so you don't expect an operation on a slice to have a side effect on some other tensor that isn't expressed via a dataflow edge. The exception of course is variables, and there are sparse update operations for variables. I think TensorArray may also be relevant to your question, depending on what you're trying to achieve. @ebrevdo has the most context on TensorArray and the future plans for updating partial state.

body: In general, most TensorFlow Ops act functionally, so you don't expect an operation on a slice to have a side effect on some other tensor that isn't expressed via a dataflow edge. The exception of course is variables, and there are sparse update operations for variables. I think TensorArray may also be relevant to your question, depending on what you're trying to achieve. @ebrevdo has the most context on TensorArray and the future plans for updating partial state.
